books.author: by Si Robertson with Mark Schlabach
books.description: Tales from Phil’s youngest brother, retired from the Army, who works in the Duck Commander workshop.
books.name: SI-COLOGY 1

books.author: by Billy Crystal
books.description: The 65-year-old comedian’s reminiscences and his complaints about aging.
books.name: STILL FOOLIN' 'EM

books.author: by Bill Dedman and Paul Clark Newell Jr.
books.description: The eccentric life of the reclusive heiress Huguette Clark, who died at the age of 104 in 2011.
books.name: EMPTY MANSIONS

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A memoir by a Brooklyn woman whose relationship with a drug runner gets her sentenced to a year in prison. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Amanda Lindhout and Sara Corbett
books.description: A memoir of a young woman’s brutal kidnapping and 460-day captivity in Somalia.
books.name: A HOUSE IN THE SKY

books.author: by Phil Robertson with Mark Schlabach
books.description: The Duck Commander pays tribute to “faith, family and ducks.”
books.name: HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY

books.author: by Reza Aslan
books.description: A biography of Jesus of Nazareth presents him in the context of his times as the leader of a revolutionary movement.
books.name: ZEALOT

books.author: by Sheri Fink
books.description: The case of a New Orleans surgeon suspected of euthanizing patients during the Katrina disaster.
books.name: FIVE DAYS AT MEMORIAL

books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The talk-radio host offers 11 proposals for returning to America’s founding principles.
books.name: THE LIBERTY AMENDMENTS

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by A. Scott Berg
books.description: A new biography of the 28th president.
books.name: WILSON

books.author: by Justin Halpern
books.description: A coming-of-age memoir organized around the musings, purveyed on Twitter, of the author’s father.
books.name: _____ MY DAD SAYS

books.author: by Scott Anderson
books.description: A history of the Arab revolt against the Turks in World War I focuses on T.E. Lawrence and other adventurers of his era.
books.name: LAWRENCE IN ARABIA

books.author: by Rebecca Musser with Bridget Cook
books.description: A memoir by a woman who helped expose crimes within a polygamous sect that she fled.
books.name: THE WITNESS WORE RED
